description:
Momoko and her friends fall into Youki`s fog trap which causes them to make lots of mistakes. Her friendship with the three gods is damaged.  A fortune teller they meet in town tells them that one of them will bring misery to the others, and they all become very suspicious.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gishin Anki!? Kiri ni Hisomu Wana
Suspicious!? The Trap in the Fog!
疑心暗鬼!? 霧に潜む罠
